name: Take Me Home (itch) (Xspree)
description:
Take Me Home

Join C.C and her little friend, I.C., on their adventure to home. On the way home, don't forget to snack on some food! It's important for them to move on and actually get C.C. home. 

 Use the WASD keys to move C.C and E to interact with food.

Use the arrow keys to move I.C. and Enter to interact with food.

Solve puzzles by snacking on food and passing each level to get C.C home. Work together in separate worlds, 2D and 3D, to move on and find your way back home.

Credits: 

Jorge Torres - 3D Artist, Programmer, Designer 

Ixel Camacho - 2D Artist, Designer, and Sound Designer
